mapper.select: select hol.oli_no, hol.m_no, hol.payment, hol.payment_date, oli.oli_no, oli.title, oli.img_path, oli.price, olt.name from history_order_lecture hol, online_lecture_introduction oli, online_lecture_teacher olt where hol.m_no = #{m_no} and hol.oli_no = oli.oli_no group by hol.oli_no order by hol.payment_date desc

select oli.oli_no, oli.title, oli.img_path, oli.price, olt.name, oll.reg_date from online_lecture_introduction oli, online_lecture_teacher olt, online_lecture_like oll where oll.m_no = #{m_no} and oll.oli_no = oli.oli_no group by oll.oli_no order by oll.reg_date desc

select hol.oli_no, hol.m_no, hol.payment, hol.payment_date, oli.oli_no, oli.title, oli.img_path, oli.price, olt.name, TRUNCATE((SELECT AVG(star_rating) FROM online_lecture_reply olr WHERE olr.oli_no = oli.oli_no),0) star_avg from history_order_lecture hol, online_lecture_introduction oli, online_lecture_teacher olt where hol.m_no = #{m_no} and hol.oli_no = oli.oli_no and oli.title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') group by hol.oli_no order by hol.payment_date desc
